mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO favorite_product (member_id, product_id) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productId})
mapper.select: SELECT fp.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.kor_co_nm AS korCoNm, p.risk_level AS riskLevel, p.external_link AS externalLink, p.wishlist_count AS wishlistCount FROM favorite_product fp JOIN financial_product p ON fp.product_id = p.product_id WHERE fp.member_id = #{memberId}
